ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] emergency: please read reguarding new bard songs
ygData.msgSnippet: Yepper... Thats been my experience in unrest between 28-33... I could regularly get to the ghost with clouding, including walking right over hags which would
ygData.messageBody:
Yepper...

Thats been my experience in unrest between 28-33...

I could regularly get to the ghost with clouding, including walking right
over hags which would have been insta-death at the time...

Kerouac Dharmabum
lvl 38
Rodcent Nife
----- Original Message -----
From: <Valharick@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, March 20, 2000 10:42 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] emergency: please read reguarding new bard songs


> From: Valharick@...
>
> In a message dated 3/20/00 6:59:47 PM Pacific Standard Time,
> tdomeii@... writes:
>
> << PPS: Clouding provides no invis vs undead period. >>
>
> Actually thats not entirely true. I run around unrest unmolested all the
> time. No idea what makes them any diff than dead frogs though
